channel.title: Good vps?
channel.description: anyone know of a vps website worth hosting rsps off of? I've been using reprise hosting and they've been complete shit with the downtime and whatnot and i'm fed up lol

item.title: Good vps?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

He means that he wants to know the websites of a few VPS companies. I’d just go with the google cloud platform. You can deploy your rsps in under an hour and that’ll scale out to millions of players automatically. Google’s compute infrastructure gives you consistent CPU, memory and disk performance, letting you concentrate on what matters most - your players.

Read full topic

item.title: Good vps?
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

A VPS website? I think you just mean VPS. If you want actual website hosting, that’s a different story.

I’ve used Linode for about a year now. It’s probably the best option out there bang for buck in my opinion, the uptime is 99% and the prices are amazing in comparison to other major VPSs. Their lowest option is $20 a month, which should be fine unless you’re getting a lot of players on at one time. I use it with no problems if I restart the RSPS at least once every 24 hours.

[hr]

Oh and also, since most people complain about prices, that’s the best deal you’ll find for the performance you need. VPSs are pretty expensive, especially compared to websites. But they get the job done.

Read full topic
